author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cooper Q1 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $2.79
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Cooper Companies Inc:
* THE COOPER COMPANIES ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.79
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $2.50 * Q1 REVENUE $590 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $583.5 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.51 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES ‍FISCAL 2018 TOTAL REVENUE $2,510 - $2,560 MILLION​
* SEES ‍FISCAL 2018 NON-GAAP DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $11.70 - $11.90​
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $11.62, REVENUE VIEW $2.52 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
